greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Sum_{n >= 1} ( x^(2^n)/ ((1+x^(2^(n-1)))*Product_{j=0..n-1} (1-x^(2^j)) ) ).
comment: This is the g.f. for the number of non-squashing partitions with a repeated part, that is, A000123(n) - A088567(n).
link: N. J. A. Sloane and J. A. Sellers, On non-squashing partitions, Discrete Math., 294 (2005), 259-274.
mathematica: max = 65; Sum[x^(2^n)/((1+x^(2^(n-1))) Product[1-x^(2^j), {j, 0, n-1}]), {n, 1, Log[2, max] // Ceiling}] + O[x]^(max) // CoefficientList[#, x]& (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 05 2018 *)
xref: Apart from initial terms, same as A088980.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 02 2003
